thread.title: Rita Ora clashes with Simon Cowell as X Factor tension rises - Hampshire Chronicle

author: Source: Hampshire Chronicle
title: Rita Ora clashes with Simon Cowell as X Factor tension rises - Hampshire Chronicle
text:
The X Factor's Rita Ora called fellow judge Simon Cowell "rude" as the pair clashed over contestant Katie Coleman during the Six Chair Challenge. In the explosive episode, viewers will also see the X Factor supremo throw a strop and utter an expletive after being voted mentor to the Overs.
Start the conversation, or Read more at Hampshire Chronicle.
